alert.note: Alert for Mineral (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 10 at 1:35PM PDT until further notice by NWS Reno
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Nevada... Walker River Near Mason at Snyder Lane affecting Lyon County. Walker River near PT Site below Weber Reservoir near Schurz affecting Mineral County. East Walker River Above Strosnider Ditch Near Mason affecting Lyon County. .Snowmelt and reservoir releases will cause the river flows to remain high. For the Mainstem Walker River...including PT Site below Weber Reservoir near Schurz, Mason at Snyder Lane...elevated river levels are forecast. For the East Walker River...including Strosnider Ditch Near Mason... elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Snow melt and reservoir releases will maintain high flows near flood stage. * WHERE...Walker River near PT Site below Weber Reservoir near Schurz. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 16.5 feet, Monitor stage, elevated flows with some very minor flooding of lowlands between Weber Dam and Walker Lake. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:55 PM PDT Monday the stage was 16.9 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Action stage is 16.5 feet. - Flood stage is 17.3 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when hiking or camping near riverbanks. If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. Additional information is available at www.cnrfc.noaa.gov The next statement will be issued Tuesday afternoon.
